name: Halloween Human Hunt: Ghost vs. Skeleton
name_original: Halloween Human Hunt: Ghost vs. Skeleton
description:
It is approaching the eve of Halloween, and there are so few ghosts and skeletons about (how sad!). So our protagonists, Skullivan and Betty Boo, have chosen to accept some lucky humans into underworld, joining the ranks of ghosts and skeletons. However, these two are very competitive, so they have chosen to make their conquest into a competition. Play as Skullivan and Betty Boo in this two-player splitscreen game to kill the most humans and save Halloween.

Controls:
Note: Keyboard controls are intended to be left-handed for both players

Skullivan
Movement: WASD (S to drop through platforms)
Attack: E
Interact with Statues: Q
Special (only with C powerup): F

Betty Boo
Movement: OKL; or Gamepad Joystick
Attack: P or Gamepad X
Interact with Statues: I or Gamepad A
Special (only with C powerup): ' or Gamepad Y

Creators:
Duncan Glynn - Lead Programmer, Level Designer, Tilemap Artist, Sound Design and Game Music
Ahmad Hall - Main Artists, Level Designer
Tyler Melnotte - Programmer, Level Designer, Map Designer
Charles Jenkins - UI Programmer and Artist
Adam Malik - Programmer, Main Menu Musician
All - Proud Game Designers
